contest-event.event-date:
May 17, 2014 D SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest sewbba-merthyr-tydfil-contest-third-section
Rhydycar Leisure Centre, Merthyr Tydfil, Merthyr Tydfil County, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Nanette Jones, Cornet (Ebbw Valley) Best Euphonium: Abertillery & District Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £150, 3rd £100.
May 18, 2014, 9:34 a.m. June 30, 2020, 10:53 a.m.
1 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter Purcell Variations [Downie]
2 Abertillery & District Youth Huw Cole Variations on Laudate Dominum
3 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Alice Jones Three Saints
4 Oakdale Silver Band Adrian Browning Four Cities Symphony
5 Severn Tunnel Band Christopher Bond Dimensions
6 Upper Rhondda Brass Band Nigel Seaman
7 Ystradgynlais Public Band Alex Parker
